text: 1.7 Wkp 10.9, 1 Ko 4.1, Epe 5.18, 1 Pi 5.2 Bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak, God wog ne kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmuŋ. Bɨ tep yɨbɨl mɨdek, binɨb ogɨnap nop nɨgel tep gɨnɨmuŋ. Ne yad yɨb awl yɨbɨl dɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop kodin agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmuŋ. Bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop takaw tɨmel ogɨnap kasek ma agɨnɨmuŋ. Ñɨg kɨles ñɨbɨl sawl ma lɨl, kabɨyam tɨmel ma junɨmuŋ. Mani tap okok yad nokom din agɨl gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmuŋ.
